title: No AFK Check [CLIENT]
body:
I queue up solo for ranked dynamic queue and select my two role(bot and top) and after waiting for about 2.5 to 5 mins(my usual queue time) I am booted back to the "Assemble Your Party screen" with the message "theWANAB3 did not accept the AFK Check." There is no sound or box appearing in my client, for me to accept or decline, and the client is not given priority on the front of my desktop like it usually is. This is not the first time, I have had this occur 10 maybe even 15+ times.

According to the video my mouse changes for like 3 secs and the box does pop-up when it is closing, so it is impossible to accept.

P.S. it occurs at 1:30 and I just got a 30 min penalty after that 6 min penalty...lets see how far I can go!

Update I just got another recording of it and I lost 10 lp(did I lose lp for the 6 and 30 penalty, I don't even f*g care anymore), can not even press the "Queue up" button, and my heart has broken because of rito...here it is and all of it! Go to 6:00

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=r-nfq2KF_ro

UPDATE 2: Just did it again, lost another 10lp and got a 30 min penalty. Go to 7:30

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wHhocrA2gf4

This is the frame you can see in the 3rd video:

http://imgur.com/YtSLSJ2

UPDATE 3: It is still occuring...

replies.body:
This often happens if your computer has an unstable connection to the PvP.net service, which is the service that provides queue notifications and syncs your actions to the matchmaking servers. An unstable connection is often the result of local network settings that conflict with League, so I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your settings are good.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
